sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_792d0df647b16210e52631b4116d433e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.gptFunctions</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>gptFunctions</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var gptFunctions = Class.create();
gptFunctions.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    /**
    Resolves a display value to a sys_id for a reference field.
    Supports fallback options if children exist under a matched parent.
    @param {string} table - The parent table (e.g. 'sys_user').
    @param {string} fieldOrLabel - The reference field name or column label (e.g. 'department' or 'Test Field').
    @param {string} value - The display value to resolve (e.g. 'Tokyo').
    @param {Array} schemaFields - Optional schema array from getTableSchema().
    @returns {object} { success: boolean, sys_id: string, message: string, choices?: string[] }
    */
    resolveReferenceValue: function(table, fieldOrLabel, value, schemaFields) {
        var result = {
            success: false,
            sys_id: '',
            message: ''
        };

        var fieldName = fieldOrLabel;

        // Resolve field name from schema if available
        if (Array.isArray(schemaFields)) {
            var match = schemaFields.find(function(f) {
                return f.name === fieldOrLabel || f.column_label === fieldOrLabel;
            });

            if (!match) {
                match = schemaFields.find(function(f) {
                    return f.name === 'u_' + fieldOrLabel;
                });
            }

            if (match) fieldName = match.name;
        }

        // Get reference table
        var dictGR = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        dictGR.addQuery('name', table);
        dictGR.addQuery('element', fieldName);
        dictGR.query();
        if (!dictGR.next()) {
            result.message = "Field '" + fieldOrLabel + "' not found in dictionary for table '" + table + "'";
            return result;
        }

        var refTable = dictGR.getValue('reference');
        if (!refTable) {
            result.message = "Field '" + fieldOrLabel + "' is not a reference field.";
            return result;
        }

        // Get display field from sys_db_object
        var displayField = 'name'; // fallback
        var dbObj = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
        if (dbObj.get('name', refTable)) {
            displayField = dbObj.getValue('display_column') || 'name';
        }

        // Try exact match
        var refGR = new GlideRecord(refTable);
        refGR.addQuery(displayField, value);
        refGR.setLimit(1);
        refGR.query();
        if (!refGR.next()) {
            //Fallback: fuzzy match
            refGR = new GlideRecord(refTable);
            refGR.addQuery(displayField, 'CONTAINS', value);
            refGR.setLimit(1);
            refGR.query();
            if (!refGR.next()) {
                result.message = "No match found in '" + refTable + "' for value: '" + value + "'";
                return result;
            }
        }

        // At this point we have a match
        var refSysId = refGR.getUniqueValue();
        result.success = true;
        result.sys_id = refSysId;

        // Detect self-referencing (hierarchical) field
        var childRefField = null;
        var refDictGR = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        refDictGR.addQuery('name', refTable);
        refDictGR.addQuery('internal_type', 'reference');
        refDictGR.addQuery('reference', refTable);
        refDictGR.query();
        while (refDictGR.next()) {
            childRefField = refDictGR.getValue('element');
            break; // Use first match only
        }

        // If a self-reference field exists, look for children
        if (childRefField) {
            var childGR = new GlideRecord(refTable);
            childGR.addQuery(childRefField, refSysId);
            childGR.setLimit(10);
            childGR.query();

            var children = [];
            while (childGR.next()) {
                children.push(childGR.getDisplayValue());
            }

            if (children.length > 0) {
                result.success = false;
                result.message = "Multiple child records found under '" + value + "'";
                result.choices = children;
            }
        }

        return result;
    },

    /**
    Returns all fields and their types from sys_dictionary for a given table.
    @param {string} tableName - The table name to inspect.
    @returns {object} { fields: [{name, type, reference, mandatory, column_label}] }
    */
    getTableSchema: function(tableName) {
        var fields = [];
        var dictGR = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        dictGR.addQuery('name', tableName);
        dictGR.query();
        while (dictGR.next()) {
            fields.push({
                name: dictGR.getValue('element'),
                column_label: dictGR.getValue('column_label'),
                type: dictGR.getValue('internal_type'),
                reference: dictGR.getValue('reference'),
                mandatory: dictGR.getValue('mandatory') === 'true'
            });
        }
        return {
            fields: fields
        };
    },

    /**
    Returns up to 20 display values from a reference field for a given table.
    @param {string} tableName - The name of the parent table (e.g. 'sys_user').
    @param {string} fieldName - The reference field name (e.g. 'department', 'u_test_field').
    @returns {object} { reference_table, display_field, options[] or error }
    */
    getReferenceOptions: function(tableName, fieldName) {
        var result = {
            reference_table: '',
            display_field: '',
            options: []
        };

        // Lookup dictionary to get the reference table
        var dictGR = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        dictGR.addQuery('name', tableName);
        dictGR.addQuery('element', fieldName);
        dictGR.query();
        if (!dictGR.next()) {
            result.error = "Field '" + fieldName + "' not found on table '" + tableName + "'";
            return result;
        }

        var refTable = dictGR.getValue('reference');
        if (!refTable) {
            result.error = "Field '" + fieldName + "' is not a reference field.";
            return result;
        }
        result.reference_table = refTable;

        // Get display column from sys_db_object
        var displayField = 'name';
        var dbObj = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
        if (dbObj.get('name', refTable)) {
            displayField = dbObj.getValue('display_column') || 'name';
        }
        result.display_field = displayField;

        // Fetch reference display values
        var refGR = new GlideRecord(refTable);
        refGR.orderBy(displayField);
        refGR.setLimit(20);
        refGR.query();
        while (refGR.next()) {
            result.options.push(refGR.getDisplayValue(displayField));
        }

        return result;
    },

    /**
Queries any table using filters and returns specific fields.
@param {string} table - The target table name (e.g., 'incident', 'u_custom_table')
@param {object} filters - Key-value filters (e.g., { 'email': 'bruce@wayne.com' })
@param {array} fields - Array of fields to return (e.g., ['name', 'email'])
@param {boolean} useDisplay - If true, returns display values instead of raw values
@returns {object} - { records: [ { field: value, ... } ], message, count }
*/
    anything_record: function(table, filters, fields, useDisplay) {
        var result = {
            records: [],
            count: 0,
            message: ''
        };

        if (!table || !filters || typeof filters !== 'object') {
            result.message = "Invalid table or filter parameters";
            return result;
        }

        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
        var encoded = false;

        // Add filters
        for (var key in filters) {
            if (!filters.hasOwnProperty(key)) continue;
            if (key === 'encoded_query') {
                gr.addEncodedQuery(filters[key]);
                encoded = true;
            } else {
                gr.addQuery(key, filters[key]);
            }
        }

        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            var record = {};
            var fieldList = Array.isArray(fields) && fields.length > 0 ? fields : gr.getFields();

            for (var i = 0; i < fieldList.length; i++) {
                var field = fieldList[i];
                if (!gr.isValidField(field)) continue;

                record[field] = useDisplay ? gr.getDisplayValue(field) : gr.getValue(field);
            }

            result.records.push(record);
        }

        result.count = result.records.length;
        result.message = encoded ? "Used encoded query" : "Direct query used";
        return result;
    },


    type: 'gptFunctions'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jdeluna</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-01 15:20:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>792d0df647b16210e52631b4116d433e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>gptFunctions</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_792d0df647b16210e52631b4116d433e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jdeluna</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-04 02:33:44</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
